answers.answer: Im not that far just yet...but my docs just told me when i hit 30 weeks ill b doing the same thing. But im a diabetic before pregnancy...nothing to worry about they are just being extra cautious! Ur sugar can change at any moment let alone days which can cause stress on ur baby.
Hmm its tough I have my days where its up and others where its low/normal.Is your baby very active?dr said I shouldn't be worried he's fine but he's not crazy active he's so calm lol /:

Yes very active...but i have a girl n everybody says thats normal with girls that boys are more lazy. Btw i go to the ob every two weeks already and my diabetic doc once a month but communicate with him every week! N my high risk ob once a month -_- so im over the doctors already lol

Ugh girl I would see my ob & diabetes Dr every 2 wks and my specialist every month. Now I see my ob twice a week and my diabetic Dr still every 2 wks and specialist still once a month pain in the bottom indeed but glad they r keeping a close eye on heart and movement.Yes my little monkey is lazy when I was pregnant with my first it was a girl and i felt flutters and everything very early! Sadly I miss carried at 19 wks and now pregnant with my boy and I didn't feel his movement till week 24!

question: I've gotten the ok from cardiologist that everything was fine with my baby but they said protocol for me to be seen with my ob twice a week to monitor fetal movement and heartbeat.Concerned because my doctor doesn't know why if I'm 31 weeks and protocol is at 32 weeks.Has this happened to anyone?And it just so happens my Dr didn't have report from my specialist who recommended the 2x a week visits to be more specified why so soon .Its scary /:Hope my monkey is okay
title: gestational diabetes monitoring?
